description:
Beginning with the 1976 publication of Interview with the Vampire, author Anne Rice’s The Vampire Chronicles franchise has been a favorite of bloodsucker devotees everywhere. Perhaps most well known for introducing the world to centuries-old vampire Lestat de Lioncourt, Rice’s Vampire Chronicles has so far consisted of 11 novels.自1976年《夜访吸血鬼》的问世，作者Anne Rice的小说《吸血鬼编年史》成为吸血鬼题材爱好者最喜欢的小说。其中最深入人心的可能就是让世人知道吸血鬼莱斯特，Rice的《吸血鬼编年史》目前包含了11部小说。

In 2014, it was announced that Universal Pictures and Imagine Entertainment had acquired the rights to The Vampire Chronicles, with plans to re-adapt Interview for the screen. Those plans are now apparently null and void, as Anne Rice has announced on her Facebook page that she has reacquired the film rights to the universe she created, and is planning to take The Vampire Chronicles saga to TV. According to Rice, the Vampire Chronicles TV series will – unsurprisingly – center on Lestat, and begin by telling his origin story as written in Rice’s second Chronicles novel The Vampire Lestat. 早在2014年，Universal Pictures 还有Imagine Entertainment已经获得《吸血鬼编年史》的拍摄权，计划将其搬上大荧幕。但是这项计划失效了，因为Anne Rice已经在FB上宣布取消将其拍成电影的决定，而是将《吸血鬼编年史》拍成电视剧。毫无疑问，《吸血鬼编年史》主角是Lestat，本剧将以Rice的第二部小说《吸血鬼莱斯特》为原型讲述Lestat的故事作为开端。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 吸血鬼界最负盛名的《吸血鬼编年史》要拍成电视剧啦！！！

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

               

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Meal
A meal is food eaten at a regular time, usually as breakfast, lunch, or dinner. What is the meal? Who is or are having the meal? Where does the meal take place?
This week's topic: They had a meal... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) a healthy meal
2) a quick meal
3) meal preparation
4) time allowed for a meal
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

The interior designer turned his head slight and saw the door opened with the club manager stepping in. The incoming person nodded his head and excused himself for taking so long. The interior designed replied that it was no problem. The club manager returned to his side of the desk and cleared the desk surface. Since there were no revisions needed for the sketches the interior designer presented, the meeting was basically done. With dinner time approaching, the club manager had offered to treat the interior designer to a meal.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
